verses.verse: <S%G5101>What<s%> <S%G4053>advantage<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> has the <S%G2453>Jew?<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G5622>profit<s%> is there of <S%G4061>circumcision?<s%>
<S%G4183>Much<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G5158>way:<s%> <S%G4412>chiefly,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> that to them were <S%G4100>committed<s%> the <S%G3051>oracles<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

For <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> did not <S%G569>believe?<s%> shall their <S%G570>unbelief<s%> <S%G2673>make<s%> the <S%G4102>faith<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2673>without<s%> <S%G2673>effect?<s%>

<S%G3361>God<s%> <S%G1096><s%> <S%G3361>forbid:<s%> <S%G1096><s%> <S%G1161>yes,<s%> let <S%G2316>God<s%> be <S%G227>true,<s%> but <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> a <S%G5583>liar;<s%> as it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> That you might be <S%G1344>justified<s%> in your <S%G3056>sayings,<s%> and might <S%G3528>overcome<s%> <S%G1723>when<s%> <S%G3588><s%> you are <S%G2919>judged.<s%>

But <S%G1487>if<s%> our <S%G93>unrighteousness<s%> <S%G4921>commend<s%> the <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> shall we <S%G2046>say?<s%> Is <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G94>unrighteous<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G2018>takes<s%> <S%G3709>vengeance?<s%> (I <S%G3004>speak<s%> as a <S%G444>man)<s%>
<S%G3361>God<s%> <S%G1096><s%> <S%G3361>forbid:<s%> <S%G1096><s%> for then <S%G4459>how<s%> shall <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2919>judge<s%> the <S%G2889>world?<s%>

For <S%G1487>if<s%> the <S%G225>truth<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> has more <S%G4052>abounded<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> my <S%G5582>lie<s%> to his <S%G1391>glory;<s%> <S%G5101>why<s%> <S%G2089>yet<s%> am I <S%G2504>also<s%> <S%G2919>judged<s%> as a <S%G268>sinner?<s%>

And not rather, (as we be <S%G987>slanderously<s%> <S%G987>reported,<s%> and as <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G5346>affirm<s%> that we <S%G3004>say,<s%>) Let us <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G2556>evil,<s%> that <S%G18>good<s%> may <S%G2064>come?<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G2917>damnation<s%> is <S%G1738>just.<s%>

<S%G5101>What<s%> <S%G3767>then?<s%> are we <S%G4284>better<s%> than they? <S%G3756>No,<s%> in <S%G3843>no<s%> <S%G3843>wise:<s%> for we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G4256>before<s%> <S%G4256>proved<s%> <S%G5037>both<s%> <S%G2453>Jews<s%> and <S%G1672>Gentiles,<s%> that they are <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> <S%G266>sin;<s%>
As it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> There is <S%G3756>none<s%> <S%G1342>righteous,<s%> no, not <S%G1520>one:<s%>
There is <S%G3756>none<s%> that <S%G4920>understands,<s%> there is <S%G3756>none<s%> that <S%G1567>seeks<s%> <S%G1567>after<s%> <S%G2316>God.<s%>

They are <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1578>gone<s%> out of the way, they are <S%G260>together<s%> <S%G889>become<s%> <S%G889>unprofitable;<s%> there is <S%G3756>none<s%> that <S%G4160>does<s%> <S%G5544>good,<s%> no, not <S%G1520>one.<s%>

Their <S%G2995>throat<s%> is an <S%G455>open<s%> <S%G5028>sepulcher;<s%> with their <S%G1100>tongues<s%> they have <S%G1387>used<s%> <S%G1387>deceit;<s%> the <S%G2447>poison<s%> of <S%G785>asps<s%> is <S%G5259>under<s%> their <S%G5491>lips:<s%>
<S%G3739>Whose<s%> <S%G4750>mouth<s%> is <S%G1073>full<s%> of <S%G685>cursing<s%> and <S%G4088>bitterness:<s%>
Their <S%G4228>feet<s%> are <S%G3691>swift<s%> to <S%G1632>shed<s%> <S%G129>blood:<s%>
<S%G4938>Destruction<s%> and <S%G5004>misery<s%> are in their <S%G3598>ways:<s%>
And the <S%G3598>way<s%> of <S%G1515>peace<s%> have they not <S%G1097>known:<s%>
There is <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G5401>fear<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G561>before<s%> their <S%G3788>eyes.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> we <S%G1492>know<s%> that <S%G3745>what<s%> things <S%G1437>soever<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> it <S%G2980>said<s%> to them who are <S%G1722>under<s%> the <S%G3551>law:<s%> that <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G4750>mouth<s%> may be <S%G5420>stopped,<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%> may <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G5267>guilty<s%> before <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G1360>Therefore<s%> by the <S%G2041>deeds<s%> of the <S%G3551>law<s%> there shall <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3956><s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%> be <S%G1344>justified<s%> in his <S%G1799>sight:<s%> for by the <S%G3551>law<s%> is the <S%G1922>knowledge<s%> of <S%G266>sin.<s%>

But <S%G3568>now<s%> the <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> is <S%G5319>manifested,<s%> being <S%G3140>witnessed<s%> by the <S%G3551>law<s%> and the <S%G4396>prophets;<s%>

<S%G1161>Even<s%> the <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> which is by <S%G4102>faith<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> and on <S%G3956>all<s%> them that <S%G4100>believe:<s%> for there is <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G1293>difference:<s%>
For <S%G3956>all<s%> have <S%G264>sinned,<s%> and <S%G5302>come<s%> <S%G5302>short<s%> of the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G2316>God;<s%>
Being <S%G1344>justified<s%> <S%G1432>freely<s%> by his <S%G5485>grace<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G629>redemption<s%> that is in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus:<s%>

<S%G3739>Whom<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> has <S%G4388>set<s%> <S%G4388>forth<s%> to be a <S%G2435>propitiation<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> in his <S%G129>blood,<s%> to <S%G1732>declare<s%> his <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> for the <S%G3929>remission<s%> of <S%G265>sins<s%> that are <S%G4266>past,<s%> <S%G1722>through<s%> the <S%G463>forbearance<s%> of <S%G2316>God;<s%>

To <S%G1732>declare,<s%> I say, <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G3588>this<s%> <S%G3568><s%> <S%G2540>time<s%> his <S%G1343>righteousness:<s%> that he might be <S%G1342>just,<s%> and the <S%G1344>justifier<s%> of him which <S%G1537>believes<s%> <S%G4102><s%> in <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

<S%G4226>Where<s%> is <S%G2746>boasting<s%> <S%G3767>then?<s%> It is <S%G1576>excluded.<s%> By <S%G4169>what<s%> <S%G3551>law?<s%> of <S%G2041>works?<s%> <S%G3780>No:<s%> but by the <S%G3551>law<s%> of <S%G4102>faith.<s%>
<S%G3767>Therefore<s%> we <S%G3049>conclude<s%> that a <S%G444>man<s%> is <S%G1344>justified<s%> by <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G5565>without<s%> the <S%G2041>deeds<s%> of the <S%G3551>law.<s%>
Is he the <S%G2316>God<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G3440>only?<s%> is he not <S%G2532>also<s%> of the <S%G1484>Gentiles?<s%> <S%G3483>Yes,<s%> of the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> <S%G2532>also:<s%>

<S%G1897>Seeing<s%> it is <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> shall <S%G1344>justify<s%> the <S%G4061>circumcision<s%> by <S%G4102>faith,<s%> and <S%G203>uncircumcision<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G4102>faith.<s%>

Do we <S%G3767>then<s%> <S%G2673>make<s%> <S%G2673>void<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G4102>faith?<s%> <S%G3336>God<s%> <S%G1096><s%> <S%G3361>forbid:<s%> <S%G1096><s%> <S%G235>yes,<s%> we <S%G2476>establish<s%> the <S%G3551>law.<s%>
